video.title: Beyblade: BeyWheelz
video.synopsis: This anime-based saga is adapted from the "Beyblade" series but moves the action to the city of Destection, under attack by a force of Dominators.

episodes.synopsis: In the final round of the BeyWheelz World Championships, Sho Tenma and his Soaring Wing Pegasus battle Jin Ryu and his Doom Fire Drago.
episodes.title: New Generation

episodes.synopsis: Many young Wheelers approach Sho, Jin and Leon and ask to join their team, Estrella. Leon grudgingly sets up a series of BeyWheelz tests for them.
episodes.title: The Dominators Attack

episodes.synopsis: While Jin and Sho meet with Ryan at DREAM headquarters to discuss the Dominator menace, Leon reluctantly helps kids train with their Beys.
episodes.title: The Fateful Tag-Team Battle

episodes.synopsis: Leon travels to a desert town called San Miguel to find a Wheeler known as "the strong armed outlaw."
episodes.title: The Wheeler of the Wilderness

episodes.synopsis: Sho and Jin travel to Das Vegas, where they hope to find strong bladers who will join them in their quest to defeat the Dominators.
episodes.title: Race! The Beywheelz Grand Prix

episodes.synopsis: The members of Team Estrella return to Destection City with their new allies to prepare for a battle with the Dominators.
episodes.title: Judgement Bey Begins!

episodes.synopsis: Team Estrella has won the first match against the Dominators in the Judgment Bey Tournament and both teams are preparing for the next match.
episodes.title: The Law of the Dominators

episodes.synopsis: Leon is training hard as he will be battling Jake of the Dominators in the next match in the Judgment Bey Tournament, to be held in an ice stadium.
episodes.title: Avenger on the Ice

episodes.synopsis: After a heated discussion, it's decided that Jin of Team Estrella will battle Glen of Team Dominator in the next match of the Judgment Bey Tournament.
episodes.title: The Phoenix vs. The White Dragon

episodes.synopsis: With the Judgment Bey Tournament tied, there is a fifth and deciding match between Team Estrella's Sho and Team Dominator's Odin.
episodes.title: Fierce Fight! A Battle of the Spirit

episodes.synopsis: Ryan shocks the members of Team Estrella by offering them a chance to become the new Dominators and work for him.
episodes.title: The Shocking Truth

episodes.synopsis: Team Estrella arrives at DREAM headquarters and announces that they are there to stop Ryan from achieving his plan to invade another world.
episodes.title: The Wheeler Bond

episodes.synopsis: Odin surprises everyone when he refuses to battle Sho and turns his Bey to battle Ryan instead. Ryan defeats Odin and then challenges Sho.
episodes.title: A New World
